name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfDuplicateExistsInArray
description: Checks if an array contains duplicate values, checking against null is optional
sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  any(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIfDuplicateExistsInArrayByIndex(
      array: ri!array,
      index: _,
      skipNulls: ri!skipNulls,
      caseSensitive: ri!caseSensitive
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_enumForCount(input: ri!array)
  )
)
